summary: While on a trip to drop off her daughter at college, Rebecca Mayer's protective mother instincts kick in when they are terrorized on the highway. She will keep her daughter safe - at any cost.
cast: Lori Loughlin|Kristen Dalton|Shaun Sipos|Jordan Danger|Christopher Backus|Alix Elizabeth Gitter|Ted McGinley|Trevor St. John|Josh Daugherty|Matt Corboy|Jordan Woolley|Natalie Desselle Reid|John Rubinstein|Kara Luiz|John Bonny|Kane Ritchotte|Alec George|Sean Smith|Michael Adam Hamilton|Avi Rothman|Jonathan Davila|Robert Anthony Jacobs|Curtis Kingsley
title: La furia de una madre
